name: simple-history
description: WordPress audit log and history plugin with nice GUI
author: Pär Thernström

scripts.php:phpstan: docker compose run --rm php-lint vendor/bin/phpstan analyse --memory-limit 2048M
scripts.php:rector: docker compose run --rm php-lint vendor/bin/rector process --dry-run
scripts.php:rector-fix: docker compose run --rm php-lint vendor/bin/rector process
scripts.test:all-php-versions: npm run test:php74 && npm run test:php81
scripts.test:php74: npm run test:wpunit && npm run test:functional && npm run test:acceptance
scripts.test:php74-mysql55: DB_IMAGE=biarms/mysql:5.5 DB_DATA_DIR=./data/mysql-5.5 npm run test:wpunit && npm run test:functional && npm run test:acceptance
scripts.test:php81: PHP_CLI_VERSION=81 PHP_VERSION=8.1 npm run test:wpunit && npm run test:functional && npm run test:acceptance
scripts.test:php81-mysql55: PHP_CLI_VERSION=81 PHP_VERSION=8.1 DB_IMAGE=biarms/mysql:5.5 DB_DATA_DIR=./data/mysql-5.5 npm run test:wpunit && npm run test:functional && npm run test:acceptance
scripts.test:php81-mysql57: PHP_CLI_VERSION=81 PHP_VERSION=8.1 DB_IMAGE=biarms/mysql:5.7 DB_DATA_DIR=./data/mysql-5.7 npm run test:wpunit && npm run test:functional && npm run test:acceptance
scripts.test:wpunit: docker compose run --rm php-cli vendor/bin/codecept run wpunit
scripts.test:functional: docker compose run --rm php-cli vendor/bin/codecept run functional
scripts.test:acceptance: docker compose run --rm php-cli vendor/bin/codecept run acceptance
scripts.test:log-query-mysq55: PHP_CLI_VERSION=81 PHP_VERSION=8.1 DB_IMAGE=biarms/mysql:5.5 DB_DATA_DIR=./data/mysql-5.5 npm run test:wpunit-logquery
scripts.test:log-query-mysq57: PHP_CLI_VERSION=81 PHP_VERSION=8.1 DB_IMAGE=biarms/mysql:5.7 DB_DATA_DIR=./data/mysql-5.7 npm run test:wpunit-logquery
scripts.test:log-query-mariadb105: PHP_CLI_VERSION=81 PHP_VERSION=8.1 DB_IMAGE=mariadb:10.5 DB_DATA_DIR=./data/mysql npm run test:wpunit-logquery
scripts.test:wpunit-logquery: docker compose run --rm php-cli vendor/bin/codecept run wpunit:LogQueryTest
scripts.lint:claude: ~/.claude/local/claude -p 'you are a linter. please look at the changes vs. main and report any issues related to typos. report the filename and line number on one line, and a description of the issue on the second line. do not return any other text.'
scripts.wp-env:reset: npx wp-env reset && npx wp-env start
